block.p: BECKHARD - Richard. Beloved people-developer, dies at 81, on December 28, 1999. Pioneer and innovator in field of Orgnization Development. Consultant world wide to senior executives in managing complex change. Assisted organizations and individuals to function in a more humane, high performing and socially responsible manner. Sailor, learner, author, master teacher includg MIT Sloan School, mentor, and stage manager on Broadway. Lived in NYC and Center Lovell, ME. Survived by wife Sandra Barty and sister Barbara MacNeill. Celebration of Life on Sunday, February 13, 3 P.M., at Trinity Church, Broadway at Wall Street, New YorkY City.
